title: Powerful Tractor Plowing the Field | Farming in Action  #Tractor #TractorPlowing #PlowingTheField

tasks.task: Soak corn in water before planting.
subtasks: Allow corn seeds to soak for 24 hours.
Open bag or container holding corn seeds.
Insert corn seeds into furrows at appropriate depth.
Clear area of weeds and debris.
Tiller or plow soil to a depth of about 6 inches.
Ensure soil is loose and free from clumps.
Give a date or time for next video.
